page.title: 08 INDUSTRY
page.content: Cannock is a developing town with plenty of oppotunities for industrial growth. It has an industrial tradition stretching back to the iron industry. There is also the coal mining industry which has developed over the years into a highly skilled and technological industry. Cannock has plenty to offer an employer:- Nursery units for the small employer. Good supply of skilled and semi-skilled abour. Excellent road access to all parts of the country. It is on the edge of the conurbation for a whole range of manufacturing and financial services and supplies.
